Title: Relates to regulating buyout agreements within rent regulated apartments
Summary: Regulates buyout agreements within rent regulated apartments between a landlord and current tenant, and provides penalties for harassment by a landlord.
LawCode: Add ยง10-c, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to regulating buyouts within rent regulated apartments
